data.description: Accelerated development of Italian oral, reading and writing skills, equivalent to the completion of bothITALIAN 203andITALIAN 204.

data.description: Development of composition skills related to expository and other forms of writing, with focus on grammatical skills, conventions, rhetorical techniques for organizing information, presenting coherent arguments, and appropriateness of language to topic. Substantial work on the development of writing strategies for composing and editing.
data.title: WRITING WORKSHOP
